txt.en: 'Thank you for taking care of the horses' bedding for me!'
Bedbugs Bite
Collected fresh hay ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You replaced the first horse's bedding
That was not the right one...
The hay-piles can be found at Hengstacer Farm, in the field north of the stables.
That was not the right one...

Billy, Bobby, Lizzie, and Henry are finicky about who gets attention first. They must be cared for in the right order.\n\nÉogar's old hay-fork is well worn and can be used on the dirty hay only so often before it breaks.

You replaced the third horse's bedding
That was not the right one...
That was not the right one...
Éogar can always use more help on his farm, and today he needs the hay for the horse's bedding replaced.
That was not the right one...
You replaced the fourth horse's bedding
That was not the right one...
That was not the right one...
That was not the right one...
You broke your pitchfork, try again!

'Are you occupied? A stable-help ran by on his way to finish an errand and told me the bedding in the new horse's stable needs to be replaced, and as soon as possible. Unfortunately, Billy, Bobby, Lizzie, and Henry -- as the stable-hands have named them -- are finicky about who gets attention first, as they have a bit of a pecking order. We need to be careful to care for them in the right order, as we must not upset them too much.\n\n'It seems the stable-help has taken all the good hay-forks, and all I have left are old and brittle ones. You will only be able to use these old hay-forks on the dirty hay so many times before they will break, at which point you will have to come see me again for another.'
